00023 public abstract class Module

00050         public Module()
00051         {
00052                 entityDefinitionList = new Hashtable<String, AbstractOrmEntity>();
00053 
00054                 actionList = new Hashtable<String, AbstractAction>();

00057         protected final void setDefaultAction(AbstractAction action)
00058         {
00059                 if (action instanceof BaseAction)
00060                 {
00061                         defaultAction = ((BaseAction) (action)).getSystemName();
00062                         defaultEntity = ((BaseAction) (action)).getEntity().getSystemName();
00063                 }
00064                 else
00065                 {
00066                         defaultAction = action.getSystemName();
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 
00073         public String getDefaultAction()
00074         {
00075                 if (defaultAction == null)
00076                 {
00077                         if (getEntityDefinitionList().size() < 1)
00078                                 throw new ActionNotFoundException(
00079                                                 "Impossible de définir une action par default car aucune entité n'est utilisable.");
00080 
00081                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> currentDefinitionList = new Vector<AbstractOrmEntity>(
00082                                         getEntityDefinitionList().values());
00083 
00084                         defaultEntity = currentDefinitionList.get(0).getSystemName();
00085                         defaultAction = "GetList";
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 return defaultAction;
00089         }
00090 
00096         public void initAction(String path)
00097         {
00098                 if (!ActionCache.containsKey(getSystemName()))
00099                 {
00100                         File folder = new File(path + "/actions");
00101                         File[] listOfFiles = folder.listFiles();
00102 
00103                         for (int i = 0; i < listOfFiles.length; i++)
00104                         {
00105                                 if (listOfFiles[i].getName().endsWith(".class")
00106                                                 && !listOfFiles[i].getName().contains("$"))
00107                                 {
00108                                         String className = getClass().getPackage().getName()
00109                                                         + ".actions."
00110                                                         + listOfFiles[i].getName().split("\\.class")[0];
00111                                         AbstractAction act;
00112                                         try
00113                                         {
00114                                                 act = (AbstractAction) ModuleLoader
00115                                                                 .loadClass(className).newInstance();
00116                                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00117                                         {
00118                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00119                                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00120                                         {
00121                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00122                                         }
00123                                         addAction(act);
00124                                 }
00125                         }
00126                         ActionCache.put(getSystemName(), actionList);
00127                 }
00128                 else
00129                 {
00130                         actionList = ActionCache.get(getSystemName());
00131                 }
00132         }
00133 
00139         public void initEntityDefinition(String path)
00140         {
00141                 if (!entityCache.containsKey(getSystemName()))
00142                 {
00143                         File folder = new File(path + "/entityDefinitions");
00144                         File[] listOfFiles = folder.listFiles();
00145 
00146                         for (int i = 0; i < listOfFiles.length; i++)
00147                         {
00148                                 if (listOfFiles[i].getName().endsWith(".class")
00149                                                 && !listOfFiles[i].getName().contains("$"))
00150                                 {
00151                                         String className = getClass().getPackage().getName()
00152                                                         + ".entityDefinitions."
00153                                                         + listOfFiles[i].getName().split("\\.class")[0];
00154                                         Class<?> entityClass = ModuleLoader.loadClass(className);
00155                                         AbstractEntity def;
00156                                         try
00157                                         {
00158                                                 def = (AbstractEntity) entityClass.newInstance();
00159                                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00160                                         {
00161                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00162                                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00163                                         {
00164                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00165                                         }
00166                                         if (def instanceof AbstractOrmEntity)
00167                                                 addDefinitionEntity((AbstractOrmEntity) def);
00168                                 }
00169                         }
00170                         entityCache.put(getSystemName(), entityDefinitionList);
00171                 }
00172                 else
00173                 {
00174                         entityDefinitionList = entityCache.get(getSystemName());
00175                         for (AbstractEntity entity : entityDefinitionList.values())
00176                         {
00177                                 entity.reset();
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180         }
00181 
00182         private final void addAction(AbstractAction action)
00183         {
00184                 actionList.put(action.getSystemName(), action);
00185                 action.setOwnedByModul(this);
00186         }

00188         private final void addDefinitionEntity(AbstractOrmEntity definitinEntity)
00189         {
00190                 entityDefinitionList.put(definitinEntity.getSystemName(),
00191                                 definitinEntity);
00192         }

00214         public final AbstractOrmEntity getEntityDefinition(
00215                         String entityDefinitionName)
00216         {
00217                 AbstractOrmEntity entity = null;
00218                 try
00219                 {
00220                         entity = entityDefinitionList.get(entityDefinitionName);
00221                 } catch (NullPointerException e)
00222                 {
00223                         throw new ModuleException("entity: " + entityDefinitionName
00224                                         + " introuvable");
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 if (entity == null)
00228                         throw new ModuleException("entity: " + entityDefinitionName
00229                                         + " introuvable");
00230 
00231                 return entity;
00232         }
00233 
00238         public final AbstractAction getAction(String actionName)
00239         {
00240                 AbstractAction action = null;
00241 
00242                 if (actionName.equals("default"))
00243                         actionName = getDefaultAction();
00244 
00245                 try
00246                 {
00247                         action = actionList.get(actionName);
00248                 } catch (NullPointerException e)
00249                 {
00250                         throw new ModuleException("Action: " + actionName + " introuvable");
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 if (action == null)
00254                         throw new ModuleException("Action: " + actionName + " introuvable");
00255 
00256                 return action;
00257         }

00263         public void initDB()
00264         {
00265                 // on trouve l'ID du groupe admin
00266                 Groups group = new Groups();
00267                 group.setData("groupName", "admin");
00268                 int adminGroupsID = (Integer) ((Groups) Orm.select(group).get(0))
00269                                 .getData(group.getPrimaryKeyName());
00270                 int rightID;
00271                 GroupsRight GroupsRight = new GroupsRight();
00272 
00273                 // on donne au group admin le droit
00274                 // todo: a changé si l'on gère les dépendance de module
00275                 Right searchRight = new Right();
00276                 searchRight.setData("moduleName", getSystemName());
00277 
00278                 for (AbstractOrmEntity right : Orm.select(searchRight))
00279                 {
00280                         rightID = (Integer) ((Right) right).getData(right
00281                                         .getPrimaryKeyName());
00282 
00283                         // cree le GroupsRight
00284                         GroupsRight.setData("groupsID", adminGroupsID);
00285                         GroupsRight.setData("rightID", rightID);
00286                         Orm.insert(GroupsRight);
00287                 }
00288         }

00301         public final AbstractEntity doAction(String actionName,
00302                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00303         {
00304                 AbstractAction action = getAction(actionName);
00305                 return action.perform(parameters);
00306         }
00307 
00320         public final AbstractEntity doAction(String actionName, String entityName,
00321                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00322         {
00323                 AbstractOrmEntity entity;
00324                 try
00325                 {
00326                         entity = getEntityDefinition(entityName).getClass().newInstance();
00327                 } catch (InstantiationException e)
00328                 {
00329                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00330                 } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00331                 {
00332                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00333                 }
00334                 entity.getFields().setFromHashTable(parameters);
00335                 if (actionName.equals("New"))
00336                         return entity.newUI(parameters);
00337                 if (actionName.equals("Delete"))
00338                         return entity.deleteUI(parameters);
00339                 if (actionName.equals("Edit"))
00340                         return entity.editUI(parameters, false);
00341                 if (actionName.equals("GetList"))
00342                         return entity.getList(parameters);
00343                 if (actionName.equals("Get"))
00344                         return entity.editUI(parameters, true);
00345 
00346                 throw new ActionNotFoundException("l'action " + actionName
00347                                 + "de l'entity" + entityName + "n'existe pas");
00348         }

00355                 if (globalActionList == null)
00356                         globalActionList = new NaturalMap<String, AbstractAction>();

00416         /*
00417          * (non-Javadoc)
00418          * 
00419          * @see java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object)
00420          */
00421         @Override
00422         public boolean equals(Object obj)
00423         {
00424                 if (this == obj)
00425                         return true;
00426                 if (obj == null)
00427                         return false;
00428                 if (!(obj instanceof Module))
00429                         return false;
00430                 Module other = (Module) obj;
00431                 if (actionList == null)
00432                 {
00433                         if (other.actionList != null)
00434                                 return false;
00435                 }
00436                 else if (!actionList.equals(other.actionList))
00437                         return false;
00438                 if (defaultAction == null)
00439                 {
00440                         if (other.defaultAction != null)
00441                                 return false;
00442                 }
00443                 else if (!defaultAction.equals(other.defaultAction))
00444                         return false;
00445                 if (defaultEntity == null)
00446                 {
00447                         if (other.defaultEntity != null)
00448                                 return false;
00449                 }
00450                 else if (!defaultEntity.equals(other.defaultEntity))
00451                         return false;
00452                 if (entityDefinitionList == null)
00453                 {
00454                         if (other.entityDefinitionList != null)
00455                                 return false;
00456                 }
00457                 else if (!entityDefinitionList.equals(other.entityDefinitionList))
00458                         return false;
00459                 if (globalActionList == null)
00460                 {
00461                         if (other.globalActionList != null)
00462                                 return false;
00463                 }
00464                 else if (!globalActionList.equals(other.globalActionList))
00465                         return false;
00466                 if (visibleName == null)
00467                 {
00468                         if (other.visibleName != null)
00469                                 return false;
00470                 }
00471                 else if (!visibleName.equals(other.visibleName))
00472                         return false;
00473                 return true;
00474         }

00490         public NaturalMap<String, AbstractAction> getGlobalActionMenuOrReturnDefaultBehavior()
00491 
00492         {
00493                 if (getGlobalActionMenu().size() < 1)
00494                         return getDefaultBehaviorMenu();
00495                 return getGlobalActionMenu();
00496         }
00497 
00498         private NaturalMap<String, AbstractAction> getDefaultBehaviorMenu()
00499 
00500         {
00501                 if (defaultBehaviorMenu == null)
00502                 {
00503                         defaultBehaviorMenu = new NaturalMap<String, AbstractAction>();
00504                         Collection<AbstractOrmEntity> currentEntityDefinitionList = getEntityDefinitionList()
00505                                         .values();
00506                         for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : currentEntityDefinitionList)
00507                         {
00508                                 if (entity == null)
00509                                         continue;
00510                                 entity.initFields();
00511                                 String visibleActionName = entity.getVisibleName();
00512 
00513                                 if (visibleActionName == null)
00514                                         continue;
00515                                 if (!defaultBehaviorMenu.containsKey(visibleActionName))
00516                                         try
00517                                         {
00518                                                 defaultBehaviorMenu.put(visibleActionName,
00519                                                                 new BaseAction("GetList", entity.getClass()
00520                                                                                 .newInstance()));
00521                                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00522                                         {
00523                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00524                                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00525                                         {
00526                                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00527                                         }
00528                         }
00529                 }
00530                 return defaultBehaviorMenu;
00531         }
